languages.text: {n}Регент Ааронто медленно кивает.{/n} "В таком случае Дом Орселлио глубоко обязан Вольному Торговцу, и мы готовы щедро отплатить за ваше благородство. Полагаю, пакта о дружбе и союзе, подкрепленного несколькими крайне редкими артефактами, должно быть достаточно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Регент Ааронто медленно кивает.{/n} "В таком случае Дом Орселлио глубоко обязан Вольному Торговцу, и мы готовы щедро отплатить за ваше благородство. Полагаю, пакта о дружбе и союзе, подкрепленного несколькими крайне редкими артефактами, должно быть достаточно".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Regent Aaronto nods slowly.{/n} "In that case, House Orsellio is deeply indebted to the Rogue Trader, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. We trust that a treaty of friendship and alliance underpinned by the transfer of several artefacts of exceeding rarity will suffice."
languages.original_text: {n}Регент Ааронто медленно кивает.{/n} "В таком случае Дом Орселлио глубоко обязан Вольному Торговцу, и мы готовы щедро отплатить за ваше благородство. Полагаю, пакта о дружбе и союзе, подкрепленного несколькими крайне редкими артефактами, должно быть достаточно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Regent Aaronto nods slowly.{/n} "In this case House Orsellio is deeply grateful to the Rogue Trader, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. I trust a treaty of friendship and alliance enforced by transfer of several artifacts of exceeding rarity will suffice."

traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}阿伦托摄政王缓缓地点点头。{/n}“如果是这样，那奥赛罗家族确实欠了行商浪人一个大大的人情。我们愿意报答行商浪人如此慷慨仁慈的行为。我们相信，通过转让几件极其稀有的造物，应该就足以表达我们双方的友好态度，缔结联盟关系了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Regent Aaronto nods slowly.{/n} "In that case, House Orsellio is deeply indebted to the Rogue Trader, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. We trust that a treaty of friendship and alliance underpinned by the transfer of several artefacts of exceeding rarity will suffice."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿伦托摄政王缓缓地点点头。{/n}“如果是这样，那奥塞罗家族确实欠了行商浪人一个大大的人情。我们愿意报答行商浪人如此慷慨仁慈的行为。我们相信，通过转让几件极其稀有的造物，应该就足以表达我们双方的友好态度，缔结联盟关系了。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}El regente Aaronto asiente lentamente.{/n} «En ese caso, la casa Orsellio ha contraído una gran deuda con usted, Comerciante Independiente, y estamos dispuestos a responder a tan magnánimo gesto. Esperamos que con un tratado de amistad y alianza, apoyado por la transferencia de varios artefactos singulares, sea suficiente».
languages.original_text: {n}Regent Aaronto nods slowly.{/n} "In that case, House Orsellio is deeply indebted to the Rogue Trader, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. We trust that a treaty of friendship and alliance underpinned by the transfer of several artefacts of exceeding rarity will suffice."

traits.locale_text: {n}El regente Aaronto asiente lentamente.{/n} «En ese caso, la casa Orsellio ha contraído una gran deuda con usted, Comerciante Independiente, y estamos dispuestos a responder a tan magnánimo gesto. Esperamos que con un tratado de amistad y alianza, apoyado por la transferencia de varios artefactos singulares, sea suficiente».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}摂政アーロントはゆっくりとうなずく{/n}「今回の件において、オーセリオ家は自由開拓者に深く感謝している。このような寛大な行為には喜んで応えたい。我々は友好と同盟の契約を締結し、希少価値の高いアーティファクトを譲り渡そう」
languages.original_text: {n}Regent Aaronto nods slowly.{/n} "In that case, House Orsellio is deeply indebted to the Rogue Trader, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. We trust that a treaty of friendship and alliance underpinned by the transfer of several artefacts of exceeding rarity will suffice."

traits.locale_text: {n}摂政アーロントはゆっくりとうなずく{/n}「今回の件において、オーセリオ家は自由開拓者に深く感謝している。このような寛大な行為には喜んで応えたい。我々は友好と同盟の契約を締結し、希少価値の高いアーティファクトを譲り渡そう」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Regent Aaronto nickt bedächtig.{/n} "In diesem Fall steht das Haus Orsellio {mf|beim Freihändler|bei der Freihändlerin} in großer Schuld, und wir sind willens, eine derart großzügige Geste zu erwidern. Wir sind sicher, dass ein Freundschafts- und Bündnisvertrag, verbunden mit der Übergabe einiger ausgesprochen seltener Artefakte, ausreicht."
languages.original_text: {n}Regent Aaronto nods slowly.{/n} "In that case, House Orsellio is deeply indebted to the Rogue Trader, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. We trust that a treaty of friendship and alliance underpinned by the transfer of several artefacts of exceeding rarity will suffice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Regent Aaronto nickt bedächtig.{/n} "In diesem Fall steht das Haus Orsellio {mf|beim Freihändler|bei der Freihändlerin} in großer Schuld, und wir sind willens, eine derart großzügige Geste zu erwidern. Wir sind sicher, dass ein Freundschafts- und Bündnisvertrag, verbunden mit der Übergabe einiger ausgesprochen seltenen Artefakte, ausreicht."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Le régent Aaronto hoche lentement la tête.{/n} « Dans ce cas, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a rendu un très grand service à la maison Orsellio. Nous pensons qu'un traité d'amitié et d'alliance accompagné du transfert de plusieurs artefacts rarissimes suffiront à prouver toute l'étendue de notre gratitude. »
languages.original_text: {n}Regent Aaronto nods slowly.{/n} "In that case, House Orsellio is deeply indebted to the Rogue Trader, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. We trust that a treaty of friendship and alliance underpinned by the transfer of several artefacts of exceeding rarity will suffice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le régent Aaronto hoche lentement la tête.{/n} « Dans ce cas, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a rendu un très grand service à la maison Orsellio. Nous pensons qu'un traité d'amitié et d'alliance accompagné du transfert de plusieurs artefacts rarissimes suffiront à prouver toute l'étendue de notre gratitude. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Naip Aaronto yavaşça başını sallıyor.{/n} "Bu durumda Orsellio Hanesi, Hür Tacir'e borçlanmıştır ve böyle asil bir jestin karşılığını vermek ister. Birtakım son derece nadir eserlerle taçlandırılmış bir dostluk ve müttefiklik anlaşmasının yeterli olacağını umuyoruz."
languages.original_text: {n}Regent Aaronto nods slowly.{/n} "In that case, House Orsellio is deeply indebted to the Rogue Trader, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. We trust that a treaty of friendship and alliance underpinned by the transfer of several artefacts of exceeding rarity will suffice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Naip Aaronto yavaşça başını sallıyor.{/n} "Bu durumda Orsellio Hanesi, Hür Tacir'e borçlanmıştır ve böyle asil bir jestin karşılığını vermek istiyor. Bazı son derece nadir eserlerle taçlandırılmış bir dostluk ve müttefiklik anlaşmasının yeterli olacağını umarız."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
